document.full_text: the boston bruins lauded tim thomas on friday after the veteran goaltender completed his second shutout of the series against tampa bay to help boston advance to the stanley cup finals for the first time since 1990.
document.title: full steam ahead for thomas the tank in boston
lines_and_colors: the boston bruins lauded tim thomas on friday after the veteran goaltender completed his second shutout of the series against tampa bay to help boston advance to the stanley cup finals for the first time since 1990.
